Apps Stylix Stylix is a mobile app that allows the users to virtually try-on any clothes before purchase. We accurately analyze the body of the users and allowing them to try on any clothes at anytime and anywhere. By using state of the art model, our technology can map 2D images of clothes onto the user’s body despite of their unique shape in no time and low cost.
Channel: Youtube
Project detail: Milanote FindMe FindMe provides a service that allows filtering of running athletes’ images based on the athlete’s bib number (BIB) and face recognition. Runners can access the product’s website after the event finishes, upload their face image or enter their BIB number to retrieve all of the photos containing their faces or bib in the race.
